summary: 1- CRUISE CONTROL CANCEL IS IN THE WRONG PLACE CHANGE IT WITH THE RESUME?  2- HEADLIGHT CONTROL SHOULD BE ON THE OTHER SIDE AS IT CAN BE CHANGED BY MY KNEE?  3- THE ALARM SYSTEM DOESN'T RECOGNIZE MOTORCYCLES AND AS SUCH YOU START TO STOP WATCHING YOUR BACK?  4- BRAKE PEDAL IS TO SMALL AND I FIND MYSELF MISSING IT?  5- THE SIDE MIRRORS DO NOT GO IN AND OUT AUTOMATICALLY.
